All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionableItem
Base class for user interface elements with distinct actions.
Alert
Base class for all dismissible pop-up user interface elements.
App
The CAMs application's entry point.
AuthController
The AuthController control is responsible for facilitating User login, logout and change password.
Camp
Main entity class representing a camp.
CampController
The CampController class manages camps and provides functionality for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting camps.
CampDate
Represents the date-related information for a camp, including start date, end date, and registration deadline.
CampEditor
The CampEditor class provides methods to edit various attributes of a camp.
CampFilterController
The CampFilterController class manages filtering strategies for camps.
CampInfo
The CampInfo class represents information about a camp, including its name, location, description, total slots, committee slots, and visibility status.
CampListMenu
The boundary class displaying all accessible camps to the user.
CampMenu
The boundary class displaying the current camp information and its related actions for the user.
CampRegisterMenu
The boundary class displaying the menu which allows a student to register for a camp either as an attendee or a committee.
CampSerializer
The CampSerializer class provides methods for serializing and deserializing camp information to and from an Excel file.
ChangePasswordForm
Gets current user's candidate password and changes it when a match is found.
CommitteeEnquiryMenu
The boundary class displaying menu options a committee member can select once they have selected a specific Enquiry.
CommitteeStudentListFilterMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying the options a committee member has when they wish to generate a list of students tied to the specified Camp.
CommitteeSuggestionMenu
The boundary class displaying menu options a committee member can select once they have selected a specific Suggestion they have submitted.
CommitteeViewEnquiryMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying a list of enquiries for a committee member to select.
CommitteeViewSuggestionMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying a list of suggestions the committee member has submitted for them to select.
CommonElements
Utility class providing common text elements used by classes of the view package.
CreateCampForm
The boundary class displaying the form for a staff to provide initial camp details when creating a new camp.
Displayable
Interface for displaying all user interface elements.
DisplayController
A singleton class for managing and navigating all user interface elements.
EditCampMenu
The boundary class displaying the menu for a staff to edit camp details.
EditDescriptionForm
The boundary class displaying the form for editing camp description.
EditEnquiryForm
The boundary class displaying a Form which the Student can use to edit the selected Enquiry they have submitted.
EditLocationForm
The boundary class displaying the form for editing camp location.
EditNameForm
The boundary class displaying the form for editing camp name.
EditSuggestionForm
The boundary class displaying a Form which the committee member can use to edit the selected Suggestion they have submitted.
Enquiry
The Enquiry class represents an inquiry made by a student.
EnquiryEditor
The EnquiryEditor class edits the respective enquiries of the Camp passed to it.
FilterByDate
The camp start date filter class implementation of the FilterStrategy interface.
FilterByDateForm
The boundary class displaying the form to add or set the date filter when viewing camps.
FilterByLocation
The camp location filter class implementation of the FilterStrategy interface.
FilterByLocationForm
The boundary class displaying the form to add or set the location filter when viewing camps.
FilterByName
The camp name filter class implementation of the FilterStrategy interface.
FilterByNameForm
The boundary class displaying the form to add or set the name filter when viewing camps.
FilterByStaff
The camp staff in charge visibility filter class implementation of the FilterStrategy interface.
FilterByStaffForm
The boundary class displaying the form to add or set the staff filter when viewing camps.
FilterByUserGroup
The camp user group filter class implementation of the FilterStrategy interface.
FilterByUserGroupForm
The boundary class displaying the form to add or set the user group filter when viewing camps.
FilterByVisibility
The camp visibility filter class implementation of the FilterStrategy interface.
FilterByVisibilityForm
The boundary class displaying the form to add or set the camp visibility filter when viewing camps.
FilterCampMenu
The boundary class displaying the menu to view camps and change the viewing filters.
FilterStrategy
The interface for filtering a list of camps.
FilterStrategyForm
The base boundary class displaying the current specified filter strategy.
Form
Base class for all user interface elements which requires user input and runs an action after retrieving them.
InvalidAlert
Dismissible pop-up when user selects an invalid choice in a menu.
ItemAction
Interface for actions of user interface elements.
LoginErrorAlert
Alerts user when no user ID and password combination is found in the database.
LoginForm
User login interface.
LogoutAlert
Alerts user that the account is logged out.
PerformanceReportSerializer
The PerformanceReportSerializer class provides a method for generating a performance report for a specific camp and serializing it to an Excel file.
Repliable
The Repliable is the base class for Enquiry and Suggestion.
RepliableEditorInterface
The RepliableEditorInterface is the interface for EnquiryEditor and SuggestionEditor.
RepliableSerializer
The RepliableSerializer class provides methods to serialize and deserialize Enquiry and Suggestion objects to and from Excel files.
ReplyEnquiryForm
The boundary class displaying a Form which the Staff committee member can use to reply to the selected Enquiry.
ReplySuggestionForm
The boundary class displaying a Form which the Staff can use to approve the selected Suggestion.
SelectionMenu
Base class for all user interface elements with actionable selections.
SetFilterCampMenu
The boundary class displaying the menu to set camp viewing filters.
Staff
The Staff entity class represents a staff member in the system, extending the User class.
StaffCampMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying menu options once the Staff has selected a Camp they created.
StaffController
The StaffController control class is responsible for managing the current staff user in the system.
StaffEnquiryMenu
The boundary class displaying menu options a Staff can select once they have selected a specific Enquiry.
StaffMenu
The boundary class displaying menu options for the Staff to select.
StaffStudentListFilterMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying the options a Staff has when they wish to generate a list of students tied to the specified Camp.
StaffViewCampMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying a list of Camp the Staff has created.
StaffViewEnquiryMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying a list of Enquiry regarding the specified Camp they are in charge of.
StaffViewSuggestionMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying a list of Suggestion regarding the specified Camp they are in charge of.
Student
The Student entity class represents a student user in the system.
StudentCommitteeMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying menu options when a Student selects the camp they are a committee member for.
StudentController
The StudentController control class manages the interaction between the system and a student user.
StudentEnquiryMenu
The boundary class displaying menu options a Student can select once they have selected a specific Enquiry.
StudentListSerializer
The StudentListSerializer class provides a method to serialize the information of students associated with a camp, including committee members and attendees, into an Excel file.
StudentMenu
The boundary class displaying menu options for the Student to select.
StudentRegisteredCampMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying menu options a Student can select once they have selected a Camp they have registered for.
StudentViewEnquiryMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying a list of enquiries the Student has submitted for them to select.
StudentViewRegisteredCampMenu
The boundary class responsible for displaying a list of Camps the Student has registered for.
SubmitEnquiryForm
The boundary class displaying a Form which the Student can use to submit a new Enquiry to a specific Camp.
SubmitSuggestionForm
The boundary class displaying a Form which the Student can use to submit a new Suggestion to the Camp they are committee member for.
Suggestion
The Suggestion represents a suggestion made by a camp committee member.
SuggestionEditor
The SuggestionEditor edits the suggestions listed in a specific camp.
TextBox
Base class for user interface elements which requests user input.
User
User entity is the base class for Student and Staff, facilitating the storing of general User attributes userID, name, passwordHash, and faculty.
UserController
The UserController control is responsible for facilitating access to User credentials.
UserSerializer
The UserSerializer class provides methods for serializing and deserializing user information, including both students and staff, into and from Excel files.
WelcomeMenu
Initial user interface element displayed to the user.
